title: Visual Material Strategies for Understanding Accounting Concepts

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Application of cognitive load minimization strategies in multicultural settings, including ESL (English as a Second Language) learners.

learning_goals: Learners can interpret the duality of accounting transactions and double-entry bookkeeping principles through visual aids (charts, animations) with 90% accuracy.
Learners can comparatively analyze the structural relationship between balance sheets and income statements using MDLOs (Multiple-Dimensional Learning Objectives).
Learners can understand complex accounting concepts with over 80% accuracy without language barriers using CLT (Cognitive Load Theory)-based visual materials.

resources: Basic Accounting Glossary with Translation Feature
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
